dialogue.text: Well, well, well~ Look who decided to show up! Ready for your first adventure, rookie?

dialogue.name: You
dialogue.text: I think so... I'm a bit nervous though.
Poki gives you an encouraging smile and leans forward on the counter.

choices.text: Can I meet your Puff partner?

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Ah, straight to business! I like that~ The quest is simple: you need to find a lost Puffling in the Whispering Woods.
She pulls out a map and points to a forested area marked with a small paw print.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Time to gamble!~
She opens a cabinet behind the counter, revealing various supplies and equipment.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Of course! Momo, come say hello to our new friend~

dialogue.name: Momo
dialogue.text: Fwooo~!
A small, fluffy Puffling with a cat-like face stretches and gives you a friendly wave.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Don't worry, rookie! The Whispering Woods are mostly safe. The Puffling just got lost playing hide and seek.
She pats your shoulder reassuringly.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: That's the spirit! I knew you had it in you~ Here's your quest scroll and a small reward for your confidence!
She hands you a rolled parchment and a small pouch that jingles with coins.

choices.text: Thank you! I won't let you down!

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Ah, a practical one! The reward is 15 coins, plus whatever you find in the woods. There might be some rare herbs or crystals~
Her eyes twinkle with excitement as she mentions the potential treasures.

choices.text: I need to think about it

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Bad roll!~
Better luck next time!~

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Armor is crucial for survival! This leather vest is lightweight but offers good protection. Perfect for a rookie adventurer~
She holds up a sturdy leather vest with reinforced stitching.

dialogue.name: Momo
dialogue.text: Nyaa~!

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: See? Momo likes you! Pufflings have excellent instincts about people. If Momo approves, you're definitely ready for this quest~
Momo purrs contentedly and gives you an approving nod.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Absolutely! Pufflings are incredibly helpful. They can sense danger, find hidden things, and some even have magical abilities. Momo here is great at finding lost items~
Momo puffs up proudly at the compliment.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: I believe in you, rookie! Now get out there and show the world what you're made of~
She gives you a thumbs up and a bright smile. Momo waves goodbye with their paw.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Next, you head to the Whispering Woods! The entrance is just past the town square. Look for the old oak tree with the blue ribbon~
She draws a quick map on the back of your quest scroll.

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Great choice! That'll be 8 coins. Now you're properly armed for adventure~
She carefully wraps the dagger in cloth and hands it to you.

choices.text: I'm ready for the quest now

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Excellent! That's 12 coins. You're looking more like a proper adventurer already~
She helps you adjust the vest to make sure it fits properly.

choices.text: I'm ready for the quest now

dialogue.name: Poki
dialogue.text: Pufflings are descendants of ancient dragons, you know! They're incredibly intelligent and loyal. Each one has unique abilities and personalities~
Her eyes sparkle with enthusiasm as she shares this knowledge.

choices.text: I want to learn more later

dialogue.text: With your quest scroll in hand and determination in your heart, you step out of Poki's Shop. The adventure awaits in the Whispering Woods!
You've successfully completed the prologue and are ready to begin your first quest as a Puffling adventurer!
